mapper.sql: id, create_time, update_time, enable, nationality, sort_param, short_name, nationality_en, nationality_tw, nation_code, country_code
mapper.insert: insert into national (id, create_time, update_time, enable, nationality, sort_param, short_name, nationality_en, nationality_tw, nation_code, country_code) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{enable,jdbcType=BIT}, #{nationality,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sortParam,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nationalityEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nationalityTw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countryCode,jdbcType=INTEGER})

id,
create_time,
update_time,
enable,
nationality,
sort_param,
short_name,
nationality_en,
nationality_tw,
nation_code,
country_code,

mapper.update:
update national
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
enable = #{enable,jdbcType=BIT},
nationality = #{nationality,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sort_param = #{sortParam,jdbcType=INTEGER},

nation_code = #{nationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
country_code = #{countryCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update national set create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, enable = #{enable,jdbcType=BIT}, nationality = #{nationality,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort_param = #{sortParam,jdbcType=INTEGER}, short_name = #{shortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nationality_en = #{nationalityEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nationality_tw = #{nationalityTw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nation_code = #{nationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, country_code = #{countryCode,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from national where enable = 1 exOrder by sort_param

select
from national where nation_code = #{nationCode} limit 1
